text: Mahin'yanci ganana allahacya javala, allahacya granthata bara ahe, tyaca divasapasuna, jevhapasuna akasanna ani jaminila tyane nirmana kele ahe. Tyancyapaiki cara mahine adara ani pratisthece aheta. Haca pavitra dharma ahe. Tumhi ya mahin'yancya kalata apalya prananvara atyacara karu naka ani tuîâ€Œhi sarva anekesvaravadyansi jihada kara jase te tumha sarvansi ladhatata ani laksata theva ki allaha bhaya rakhuna karma karanaryancya sobata ahe
